fcb_fab_flexible_title: Halogen-Free PCB - Designed for Health-Friendly Electrical Products
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: Want circuit boards for manufacturing halogen-free electrical products? PCBONLINE is your best halogen-free PCB supplier. Halogen-free PCB implies that the board does not contain halogens or include any compound obtained from these toxic elements.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_two: Halogen-free PCB has excellent flame retardance because phosphorus (P) and nitrogen (N) replace the halogens. Using halogen-free PCB, your products can be shipped to all over the world.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • The circuit board and mounted components do not contain halogens such as fluorine (F), chlorine (Cl), bromine (Br), iodine (I), and astatine (At).
• Its substrate is phosphorus-based and phosphorus-nitrogen-based, which helps achieve a good flame retardant effect.
• Have lower thermal expansion coefficients (CTE), longer T-260/288 (time for telamination), and higher thermal decomposition temperature (Td).
• Thus is suitable for multiple reflux processes and able to withstand higher reflux temperatures in PCBA.
• Have lower water absorption than conventional halogen-based PCB due to the  nitrogen-phosphorus redox resin.
• Have good thermal stablity and is safe to assemble and use for all industries.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_title: Why Choose Halogen-Free PCB from PCBONLINE
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_one: • Halogen-free PCB material selection, production, assembly, and packaging  are fully implemented.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_two: • We can produce and assemble complex types of halogen-free PCB, such as the multilayer, rigid-flex, etc..
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_three: • Offer halogen-free electrical components and final product assembly as well.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_four: • When receiving an inquiry about halogen free requirements, we will conduct a free professional evaluation to confirm whether the requirements can be met.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_five: • The engineering department will change the related BOM and process sheets for the halogen free inquiry.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_six: • You will receive quick and good EMS services of halogen-free PCB, including manufacturing, assembly, components, final product packaging, etc..

fcb_fab_flexible_related_title: Other Users Are Also Getting a Quote to Related Products
fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: Lead-Free PCB does no harm to the human-being and the environment, and can be shipped to Europe and rest the world. You can online order lead-free PCB, soldering, and components from us.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: Aluminum PCB is an excellent choice for applications that require high power yields within tight tolerances, such as automotive and power electronics, thermal sensitive equipment or anything else that heat can damage it's components.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: Carbon PCB has permanent carbon ink film and is super stable. It is very cost-effective yet has good performance. It is very suitable for daily appliances and devices with multifunctional meters.
